Comment: Here's the deal with places like China, and any adversary really.  They do lie and deceive for their own gain and our detriment.  But, if they lie about everything all the time, nothing they say is taken seriously.  It's all dismissed out of hand.  Sooo... Like any good propagandists... They sprinkle in some truths here and there.  Just enough to make it so you can't just ignore everything.  They're telling the truth in order to facilitate their deceptions, but that doesn't mean on the occasions they do say something truthful that it's not truthful.  You can distrust the motives of the messenger, but you shouldn't dismiss the message out of hand without examining it first... Because they may be tell the truth, even if they're only doing it to manipulate you.  Don't make the mistake of treating what our geopolitical adversaries say in the same way as the terminally TDS afflicted treat what Trump says.
